lemma open_closed_invariant: fixes J assumes "A \<TTurnstile> (I \<rightarrow>) P" and "subreachable A U J" and localp: "\<And>\<sigma> \<sigma>' s. \<lbrakk> \<forall>j\<in>J. \<sigma>' j = \<sigma> j; P (\<sigma>', s) \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P (\<sigma>, s)" shows "A \<Turnstile> (act I, U \<rightarrow>) P"
